sourcesContent: import { Component,OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Params } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-recipe-edit', templateUrl: './recipe-edit.component.html', styleUrls: ['./recipe-edit.component.css'] }) export class RecipeEditComponent implements OnInit{ constructor(private route:ActivatedRoute){}; recipeId!:number; isEdit:boolean = true; ngOnInit(): void { this.route.params.subscribe((param:Params)=>{ this.recipeId = param['id']; this.isEdit = param['id'] != undefined; console.log(this.isEdit); }) } }
